item.title: Session 1
item.description: About the course 15 sessions 11 lectures 3 lab sessions 2 individual assignments 1 final quiz Evaluation method Individual work: 30% Final exam: 20% Class participation: 20% Workgroups: 30% Learning Objectives Learn What\’s programming Understand data structures Understand how computers execute programs Learn the basics of Python Session structure Lecture ~50 mins Guided exercises ~30 mins Plan for today Learn about software Understand what are algorithms Understand what are data structures What is code?
